name: Contra is Back!
description:
Key features:

  • Contra Super C remake
  • Couch coop with up to 4 players
  • Smooth control
  • Play time: 40 minutes
  • The download version has better graphic and performance (Free - click "No thanks" for payment)

Control:

  • Keyboard: WSAD, JK, Esc
  • Gamepad

Disclaimer: 

  • It's not a commercial product
  • Contra is produced by Konami 
  • Apart from remade elements, all used resource trademarks etc belong to the respective owners
